-------------------------------------------

This map was made for the Spring 2020 KSF Surf Mapping Contest.

The theme given was "sunnyhappylove" so for my map I decided to go with what I and hopefully others love in surf. I went and got inspiration from one of my favourite surf maps of all time; surf_mushroom(_ksf). My goal was to capture the same style of surf of mushroom without all the gimmicky stuff it has. Also I added in alot of nature elements for the cozy feel. What isn't more happylove about someone so inspired by a map he wants to make it into his own style just so he can enjoy it in some way even more :).

The map is somewhere between 45 seconds and 1 minute.

-------------------------------------------

CSGO port made by Granis after release (:.
